content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

```julia
strings = ["this", "is", "a", "test"]
results = Vector{String}(length(strings))
tasks = []
for (index, s) in enumerate(strings)
    push!(tasks, @task pig_latinify(s))
end
schedule(Task(() -> foreach(wait, tasks)))
foreach(i->begin
    results[i] = fetch(tasks[i])
end, 1:length(tasks))
results
```
